docs.title: What is Angular?
docs.description: A framework used to build frontend web applications, with asychronous refreshing of parts of the page without reload.

docs.title: Pros & Cons
docs.description: Pros: Modular approach, re-usable code, lot's of built in capabilities (Routing, validations), unit testable. Cons: ~

docs.title: Angular CLI
docs.description: Command Line Interface to interact with angular commands

docs.title: Callback function
docs.description: A function that is passed as an argument to another function and is called after an opertation has completed.
